front.title: Test Cases for HMAC-RIPEMD160 and HMAC-RIPEMD128

abstract.t: This document provides two sets of test cases for HMAC-RIPEMD160 and HMAC-RIPEMD128, respectively. HMAC-RIPEMD160 and HMAC-RIPEMD128 are two constructs of the HMAC message authentication function using the RIPEMD-160 and RIPEMD-128 hash functions. The test cases and results provided in this document are meant to be used as a conformance test for HMAC-RIPEMD160 and HMAC-RIPEMD128 implementations.
